clientBackend.model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientBackend.model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the physical board, including all tiles, chits, harbors, roads, dwellings, and the robber

      • generateInvoices

        public java.util.Collection<ResourceInvoice> generateInvoices(int number)
        Generates and returns a collection of invoices corresponding to a given dice roll. One invoice will be generated for each resource type with a non-zero count for each player.
        Parameters:
        number - the result of the dice roll
        Returns:
        a collection of invoices consisting of one invoice for each resource type with a non-zero count for each player
